sentence: Since  the  Oct.  7  Hamas  attack  on  Israel,  Israeli  attacks  have  killed  more  than  26,000  Palestinians,  according  to  Gaza  health  officials,  most  of  whom  are  women  and  children,  and  displaced  about  85%  of  people  in  the  territory.

Hamas  militants  killed  some  1,200  people  in  Israel  in  the  Oct.  7  attack  and  seized  some  250  hostages,  about  100  of  whom  are  still  alive  and  being  held,  according  to  Israeli  officials.
